Note: the sequences used in this test are taken from the Supplementary Info of:

Niels Schlichting, Felix Reinhardt, Sven Jager, Michael Schmidt, Johannes Kabisch,
Optimization of the experimental parameters of the ligase cycling reaction,
Synthetic Biology, Volume 4, Issue 1, 2019, ysz020,
https://doi.org/10.1093/synbio/ysz020
